name: Your Priorities
description: Your Priorities is a cloud-based online idea generation, deliberation & decision-making platform connecting governments and citizens, evolving since 2008 in thousands of projects, connecting millions of citizens to governments.

SDGs.evidenceText: Your Priorities is used in cities around the world enabling citizens to participate in order to help cities take better decisions on budgets and policies. An example is Better Reykjavik, a platform run in collaboration with the city of Reykjavik since the year 2010..

Your Priorities helps governments around the world include citizens in decision making. Your Priorities has been used in over 25 countries on 5 continents. Here is an example on how the Scottish Parliament used Your Priorities ensure citizens can participate in decision making.
